segments.text: Martha . What's wrong ? Why are you crying ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Jake just broke up with me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry . When did this happen ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yesterday . I didn't even know it was coming . He just told me he found someone else .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What a jerk . He doesn't deserve you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But it still hurts . I thought I loved him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He didn't treat you that well either . Maybe you don't want to hear this , but I think you can do better .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Better or worse , it doesn't matter . I had a lot of feelings for him . I really liked him
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It must be really painful . I remember when Josh and I broke up . I was crying for a week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . I'll get over him . My first break up was painful because I was naive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Exactly . You'll find someone again . You should get your mind off of this . Let's go shopping .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe tomorrow . I don't feel like it tonight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about coffee down the street ?
segments.speaker: S1
